relatedBlades.title: Application security & performance solutions
relatedBlades.subtitle: Solutions that solve security and performance needs for your applications and websites.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's app security solution combines protection with performance to ensure your applications are secure without compromising user experiences.

features.title: Connected with all networks, enterprises, and clouds
features.description: Cloudflare protects millions of web properties and serves tens of millions of HTTP requests per second on average. We seamlessly connect your apps and APIs hosted in public, private and hybrid clouds, and hosted on-premises.

features.title: Built-in application services platform intelligence
features.description: Cloudflare leverages data from various application and network sources to secure and accelerate web apps and APIs. Application security, performance, compliance, and privacy functions are built in without disrupting connectivity.

features.title: Unified and simplified Interface
features.description: Simplify security and accelerate performance of your web apps hosted anywhere with Cloudflare's connectivity cloud. Consolidate with our easy to use and integrated console, deep, request-level analytics, and machine learning assisted policy

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare recognized over 60x  by leading analysts

content.value: CASE STUDY
Cloudflare enables Mindbody to deliver a smooth, secure online experience with a powerful security solution.
Blocking cyber threats
with an easy-to-use, powerful security architecture
Consumers expect a secure, seamless experience, but this can be compromised by cyberattacks that cause account lockouts and potentially leverage compromised credentials.

After a thorough evaluation, Mindbody decided to partner with Cloudflare to implement a solution that seamlessly protects both its on-prem and cloud-based assets. This shift replaced seven standalone products with one integrated, user-friendly Cloudflare solution that dramatically reduced Mindbody's exposure to these automated attacks.
View case study
"With Cloudflare, our security blocks have dropped by about 95%, which is a huge improvement.
We've mitigated bot scraping and improved the customer experience."
Eric Pierce • Senior Manager, Cyber Security

relatedBlades.bladeName: Application Security Solutions - FAQs - Accordion Blade
relatedBlades.title: Application security solutions FAQs

content.value: Application security solutions include a range of practices and technologies that protect web applications from cyber threats and vulnerabilities. These solutions include tools like web application firewalls (WAFs), API gateways, distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) protection, and bot management.
Application security is critical to protecting digital assets. Without it, organizations risk financial losses, compromised systems, legal liabilities, and damage to their brand.

accordionElements.title: How do I improve application security?

content.value: Best practices to secure web applications include requiring input validation, using up-to-date encryption, identifying shadow APIs, documenting code changes, and enforcing strong authentication and authorization controls.

relatedBlades.title: Protect and accelerate your web apps and APIs
